citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
On 11/17/2023, the IACUC conducted a semi-annual review of its animal care and use program and animal facility
inspection; however, no report was prepared and submitted to the Institutional Official (IO) as required. Reports
completed by the IACUC ensures the Institutional Official is informed and up to date regarding the current status of the
animal program, facilities, and procedures. The IACUC must prepare reports of its evaluations and submit them to the IO
of the research facility. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members and must include
any minority views.
Correct from this date 03/26/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
On 11/17/2023, the IACUC conducted a semi-annual review of its animal care and use program and animal facility 
inspection; however,  no report was prepared and submitted to the Institutional Official (IO) as required. Reports 
completed by the IACUC ensures the Institutional Official is informed and up to date regarding the current status of the 
animal program, facilities, and procedures. The IACUC must prepare reports of its evaluations  and submit them to the IO 
of the research facility. The reports shall be reviewed  and signed by a majority of the IACUC members and must include 
any minority views. 
 
Correct from this date 03/26/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
